normalized: two weeks later.
near the fuluakia empire andceltoana alliance border.
there the draches each turned towardstheir respective home country and withdrew.
anastasia watched the scene as her emotionsran high.
in a sudden move, peace talks betweenthe two countries would begin, thanks tothe new emperor's proposal.
the talks were set to last one month.
in accordance with the celtoana pact,the talks would take place in neutral territory,the union of guilds.
during the talks, both sides wouldwithdraw their troops, and agree toa cease fire.

name: anastasia
normalized: we've finally made it this far…
the war that had lasted more than150 years finally had a conclusion insight.
as she thought about this, she lookedaround at what was once beautiful grasslands.
now there were only the trails ofdrache treads, and underneath them,bodies.

name: anastasia
normalized: both those that fought for the empire,and the alliance, i will honor your sacrificeand bring peace to celtoana.

name: noa
normalized: anastasia!
the youthful voice rung out.

name: anastasia
normalized: wah!?
at the same time, something softran into anastasia.

name: anastasia
normalized: n-…noa？

normalized: yep!

name: anastasia
normalized: noa…

even while the reformation took placewith the nobles in the palace, she had neverstopped thinking about noa.
but…

name: anastasia

where have you been all this time?

normalized: it's me!

ah!
but they treated me really well.

name: anastasia
normalized: prisoner…?
but, your name didn't comeup on the lists when we exchanged prisoners…
before engaging in the peace talks,both sides agreed to exchange prisonersof war.

name: anastasia
normalized: it… it is you.

name: anastasia

normalized: okay!

normalized: sorry noa, but as soon as we get back,i have to head to the union of guilds.

name: noa
normalized: eh?
the union's territory…?

name: anastasia
normalized: you probably already know, but peacetalks have been scheduled to take placein a union city called alraune.

name: anastasia
normalized: will you come with me?
i'll be stronger if you're there.

name: noa

the union of guilds.
located in a strategic position betweenthe empire and the alliance, on the southernend of the continent.
originally, it was a collection of severalterritories under the control of thenumerous industrial unions.
having formed before the alliance, itcovered the third most amount of land.
using the oil that had been discoveredwithin the last 200 years, they had developedthe techniques they now used to create
the drache that anastasia uses, thedraches in the alliance, and the entire country'sweapons were made by the guilds.
and now…

name: anastasia
normalized: everyone, let's stop here and take a break.
ordering her knights to stop,anastasia looked at the city.
it was the city of alraune,which lay between the border ofthe empire and the alliance.
when the empire and alliance suggestedto hold the peace talks within the union'sterritory, the union had prepared this city.

name: anastasia
normalized: i had heard that the territories in theunion were rural, but the amenities herecould rival those of the empire.
anastasia spoke her first impression of thecity of alraune.
though the empire traded with the union,this was the first time she had set foot onunion territory for herself.

name: anastasia
normalized: although i heard they had industrializedmore than the empire, i never imagined theywere this far ahead…
she was amazed.
then, as she surveyed the city, shenoticed something.

name: anastasia
normalized: what thick walls…is all this a rampart?
it was.

name: anastasia

and then continued to wonder at theabsolute and continuous solidity the wallsseemed to have.

name: anastasia
normalized: it's… like a cage…

for those walls were built not tokeep outsiders from invading, but to makesure that those already inside did not get out.
had the great walls been a beast, theiron doors would have been it's maw.
shouldit close, those it swallowed would not be

normalized: hah～～!
